table td:first-child {
  width: 10em;
}

宇宙 | yǔzhòu | universe / cosmos 宇航 | yǔháng | space flight 宇航员 | yǔhángyuán | astronaut 宇宙飞船 | yǔzhòufēichuán | spacecraft 防洪 | fánghóng | flood control / flood prevention 山洪 | shānhóng | mountain flash flood / mountain torrent 荒 | huāng | desolate / shortage / scarce / out of practice / absurd / uncultivated / to neglect 荒野 | huāngyě | wilderness
